Apple Push Notification service SSL Certificates

To configure push notifications for this iOS App ID, a Client SSL Certificate that allows your notification server to connect to the Apple Push Notification Service is required. Each iOS App ID requires its own Client SSL Certificate. Manage and generate your certificates below.

Development SSL Certificate
Name:
Apple Development iOS Push Services: com.company.app
Type:
APNs Development iOS
Expires:
30.03.2016
Revoke Download

Create an additional certificate to use for this App ID.

Disabling iCloud will invalidate any provisioning profiles that include this App ID and they must be regenerated for future use.
Switching your iCloud compatibility will invalidate any provisioning profiles that include this App ID and they must be regenerated for future use.
Disabling In App Purchase will...
Disabling Game Center will...
Disabling Passbook will invalidate any provisioning profiles that include this App ID and they must be regenerated for future use.
Disabling Data Protection will invalidate any provisioning profiles that include this App ID and they must be regenerated for future use.
Disabling Push Notifications will invalidate any provisioning profiles that include this App ID and all certificates associated with this app will be revoked and notifications will no longer be sent to users.
Disabling Inter-App Audio will invalidate any provisioning profiles that include this App ID and they must be regenerated for future use.
Enabling iCloud Storage APIs allows your apps to store content in iCloud. If you wish to enable iCloud for any existing provisioning profiles associated with this App ID, you must also regenerate them.
Enabling In App Purchase will...
Enabling Game Center will...
Enabling Passbook allows your app to display, add, or update passes in the Passbook app. If you wish to enable Passbook for any existing provisioning profiles associated with this App ID, you must also regenerate them.
Enabling Data Protection allows data to be associated with a user's passcode and provides protection in case a device is lost or stolen. If you wish to enable Data Protection for any existing provisioning profiles associated with this App ID, you must also regenerate them.
Enabling Push Notifications will...
Enabling Inter-App Audio allows your app to share audio. If you wish to enable Inter-App Audio for any existing provisioning profiles associated with this App ID, you must also regenerate them.
Revoking this certificate will invalidate it and any related services or provisioning profiles that use this certificate may be affected.
All certificates associated with the App ID will be deleted and any provisioning profiles associated with this App ID will be invalidated.
Enabling App Groups allows access to group containers that are shared among multiple related apps, and allows certain additional interprocess communication between the apps.

If you wish to enable App Groups for any existing provisioning profiles associated with this App ID, you must also regenerate them.
Disabling App Group will invalidate any provisioning profiles that include this App ID and they must be regenerated for future use.
Enabling Associated Domains allows an app to be associated with a specified domain for specific services such as accessing Safari saved passwords and activity continuation.

If you wish to enable Associated Domains for any existing provisioning profiles associated with this App ID, you must also regenerate them.
Disabling Associated Domains will invalidate any provisioning profiles that include this App ID and they must be regenerated for future use.
Enabling VPN Configuration & Control allows your app to configure and control your VPN. If you wish to enable VPN Configuration & Control for any existing provisioning profiles associated with this App ID, you must also regenerate them.
Disabling VPN Configuration & Control will invalidate any provisioning profiles that include this App ID and they must be regenerated for future use.
Enabling HealthKit allows your app, with user permission, to store and retrieve personal health information.

If you wish to enable HealthKit for any existing provisioning profiles associated with this App ID, you must also regenerate them.
Disabling HealthKit will invalidate any provisioning profiles that include this App ID and they must be regenerated for future use.
Enabling HomeKit allows your app, with user permission, to communicate with and controlling connected device in a user's home.

If you wish to enable HomeKit for any existing provisioning profiles associated with this App ID, you must also regenerate them.
Disabling HomeKit will invalidate any provisioning profiles that include this App ID and they must be regenerated for future use.
Enabling Wireless Accessory Configuration allows your app, with user permission, to configure your home wireless.

If you wish to enable Wireless Accessory Configuration for any existing provisioning profiles associated with this App ID, you must also regenerate them.
Disabling Wireless Accessory Configuration will invalidate any provisioning profiles that include this App ID and they must be regenerated for future use.
Enabling Apple Pay allows your app to accept payment information for physical goods and services to be used outside of your app.
Disabling Apple Pay will invalidate any provisioning profiles that include this App ID and they must be regenerated for future use.
